(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (ADVP (RB really))
            (VP (VBN fallen)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NN love)))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ little) (JJ black) (NN pig))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(think-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, think-2)
nsubj(fallen-6, I-3)
aux(fallen-6, have-4)
advmod(fallen-6, really-5)
ccomp(think-2, fallen-6)
prep(fallen-6, in-7)
pobj(in-7, love-8)
prep(fallen-6, with-9)

amod(pig-13, little-11)
amod(pig-13, black-12)
pobj(with-9, pig-13)

(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ seems)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (PRP me)))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (NNS creatures))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (ADJP (JJ black))))))
          (VP (VBP tend)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB command)
                  (NP (DT a) (NN premium) (NN price))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (PRP$ their) (NN meat))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN udon))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (VBP serve)
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP (DT the) (NNP Sukiyaki)))))))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD had)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a)
            (ADJP (RB very) (JJ good))
            (NN bite))
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP (PRP it)))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD did) (RB not)
        (VP (VB get)
          (ADJP (RB overly) (JJ soft))
          (PP (RB even) (IN after)
            (S
              (VP (VBG simmering)
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN soup))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP (DT a) (JJ long) (NN time)))))))))))
    (. .)))

          (NP (DT a) (NN light)
            (CC and)
            (JJ super) (NN crispy) (NN batter))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (MD can)
                (VP (VB cut)
                  (PP (IN with)
                    (NP (DT a) (NN fork))))))))))
    (. .)))


amod(flavor-2, nutty-1)
nsubj(encased-6, flavor-2)
prep(flavor-2, of-3)
det(pork-5, the-4)
pobj(of-3, pork-5)
root(ROOT-0, encased-6)
prep(encased-6, in-7)
det(light-9, a-8)
pobj(in-7, light-9)
cc(light-9, and-10)
amod(batter-13, super-11)
nn(batter-13, crispy-12)
conj(light-9, batter-13)
dobj(cut-17, which-14)
nsubj(cut-17, you-15)
aux(cut-17, can-16)
rcmod(light-9, cut-17)
prep(cut-17, with-18)
det(fork-20, a-19)
pobj(with-18, fork-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNP Tonkatsu) (NN sauce))
    (ADVP (RB here))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADVP (RB also))
        (VP (VBN made)
          (PP (IN by)
            (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Tan)))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJS best))
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBP have)
                (VP (VBN tasted)
                  (ADVP (RB so) (RB far)))))))))
    (. .)))

cc(made-7, and-11)
